title: Olga
welcome_message: Welcome to the international research Centre for Positive Change - dedicated to helping you to lead from a position of self knowledge so that you can make meaningful change to be all that you are capable of being.
enter_name_intro: Hello, my name is Olga. WELCOME TO THE GROWTH PROGRAM, YOUR TOOL FOR MAKING POSITIVE CHANGE  IN YOUR LIFE.
enter_name_intro2: goals and coach you to become all that you want to be.
the_main_task_inlife: the main task in life is to make change from a position of 'self - knowledge' and 'strength'. I know you have solutions within you and I will work with you to set your goals and pinpoint the steps you will take and the skills to ensure your success.
solutions_within_you: solutions within you and I will work with you to set your goals and pinpoint the steps you will take and the skills to ensure your success.
life_scal: How do you currently feel about your life on a scale of 1-10?
feedback_suggests_difficult_time: Your feedback suggests you’re going through a very difficult time.  Hang in there. Let's work together to find ways to lift you up. I’m with you all the way. In the meantime reach out to family, friends or a health practioner for extra support.
feedback_suggests_unhappy: Your feedback suggests you are unhappy with aspects of your life. Hang in there. Let's find what's in your heart that will make you glow, goals that will inspire you and strategies that will help you coach yourself to greater happiness. I know you will succeed as you have the answers within you. I’m with you all the way . Let’s go, and let's kickstart your journey!
feedback_suggests_happy: Your feedback suggests you are happy in your life. Thats great! There may be areas you still want to work on and refine for if you did you would thrive even more. Lets kickstart your journey and make that happen. I’m with you all the way.
partof_making_change: Part of making change is having an
partof_making_change1:
Hope is one characteristic successful people have in abundance.

Would you consider yourself a person who is optimistic and hopeful? 

Complete this short quiz and let’s find out
hope_improves: “Hope improves the quality of my life”
i_am_hopeful: “I am hopeful with regards to my life”
evenin_difficult_time: “Even in difficult times I am able to remain hopeful”
your_not_optimistic: ,  Your feedback suggests your not optimistic about life. Hang in there. Dont let any setbacks determine the rest of your life. Dont feel defeated. Let's work together so you create a life that brings you joy, hope and meaning. Goals that speak to your heart. Hang in there and you will see that there is light at the end of the tunnel.
feel_flat_about_life: ,  Your feedback suggests that you feel flat about life. Let's kick start goals that will bring you passion, fun and joy in your life. Let's focus on overcoming what is holding you back and make your dreams a reality and you are the best version of you.
a_little_hopeful_person: , Your feedback suggests you are a little hopeful about life. Thats a good start. Trust that good things will come your way.  Be brave and ask what you want from life. Let's focus on creating a life of meaning and all that you can be. Let your hope shape your future. Let's kickstart your journey.
somewht_hopeful_person: , your feedback suggests you are somewhat hopeful. That's a great start. Be brave and ask for what you want from life. Let's focus on designing goals that inspire you and the roadmap that will get you there. You are more capable than you realise. Let's help you take action and thrive.
an_optimistic_person: ,  Your feedback suggests you are an optimistic person. Let's focus on designing goals that inspire you and the roadmap that will get you there. You are more capable than you realise. Let's help you take action and thrive.
very_optimistic: , your feedback suggests you are very optimistic in life. Optimism is a key ingredient to successful goal achievment. You are half-way there.
design_goals: Let's design goals that inspire you and the roadmap that will get you there. You are more capable than you realise. Take action and you will thrive.
imagine_going_beyond: Imagine going beyond your current circumstances and limitations by thinking about the changes you want to make in the form of an ideal vision.
hope_lies_dreams: “Hope lies in dreams and imagination and in the courage of those who dare to make dreams a reality”
start_building_new: Start building the new by creating a mental picture of the life you would love and what this would look like for you.
choose_a_picture: Choose one picture that represents how you feel about life today.
choose_a_word: Choose one word that represents how you feel about life today.
how_you_love_your_life: Now select one word that represents how you would love your life to be.
use_the_free_text: Use the free text box below to type a statement that describes what you feel when you look at this picture.
choose_one_word: Choose one word from the list below that best captures what you have described above.
now_we_established: Now that we’ve established where you are, let’s focus on where you want to get to.
hopeful_people: Did you know... “Hopeful people” are found to experience greater success, life meaning, health & wellbeing, academic success, along with fewer symptoms of depression and anxiety.
rate_feel_achieve: Now let's rate whether you feel you can achieve your ideal life.
believe_in_your_capabilities: Your score suggests you don't have self-belief in your capabilities. Follow your dreams and you will astound yourself. I'm here to tell you that you are more capable than you know.
short_of_believe: Your score suggests you sort of believe in your capabilities. I'm here to tell you that you are more capable than you know.  Follow your dreams and you will astound yourself.
self-belief-a_key_ingredient: Your score shows me that you do have self-belief - a key ingredient for success. Keep following your dreams and you will astound yourself. I'm here to tell you that you are more capable than you know.
your_score_shows: Your score shows me that you do have self-belief, a key ingredient for success. Keep following your dreams and you will astound yourself. I'm here to tell you that you are more capable than you know.
lets_drive_deeper: Let’s dive a bit deeper and build your life wheel by establishing how you would currently rate where you are in each of  these areas of your life.
life_wheel: From your life wheel, select one area you would like to improve the most to help you move towards your ideal life.
How_satisfied_you: How satisfied are you that you protect your health from unhealthy food and substances.
How_satisfied_are_you: How satisfied are you that you exercise on a daily basis for fitness, energy and good health.

quality_sleep: Are you happy with the quality of your sleep?
level_of_self_care: Are you happy with your level of self-care?
well_done_looking_deep: Well done on looking deep within to identify how you feel about the different areas related to your Physical Health & Self-Care.

be_if_you: be if you don’t achieve this goal? Again, write one sentence for this
motivation_describe: Motivation describes the wants or needs that direct one's behavior toward a goal.
henry_ford_once_said: Henry Ford once said, “Whether you believe you can, or believe you can’t, you’re right”
now_ask_worth_effort: Now ask yourself, is it worth your effort?
